author: boop3247
content: Hey, I tried asking around in different places but haven't been able to get a response... It's possible to specify a `min-bid` or `builder-profit-threshold` for a validator... I seem to recall there's a recommended value to keep building blocks locally while still not losing out on large blocks from builders... Would anyone happen to know what that recommended value is? And also, it seems that you can either set `min-bid` in mev-boost or `builder-profit-threshold` in Lighthouse (which I use), but sounds like those serve the same purpose? In which case, should I prefer one over the other?

author: potuz
content: this is probably the wrong channel to ask these questions, Prysm also supports these options and probably other clients too, if you use Lighthouse the best place would be to ask in the Lighthouse Discord.
